snippet: Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. spoke with the police and community members in Chicago on Friday about law enforcement practices, his latest stop in a nationwide tour.
abstract: Attorney General Eric H Holder Jr speaks with police and community members in Chicago about law enforcement practices, his latest stop in nationwide tour that coincides with heightened national discussion about how police officers use force.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. spoke with the police and community members in Chicago on Friday about law enforcement practices, his latest stop in a nationwide tour.

headline.main: Illinois: Holder Speaks on Police Tactics
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Holder Speaks on Police Tactics
